sourcesContent: import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {UserReviewService} from "../../../services/review/userReview.service"; import {IUserReview} from "../../../models/review"; @Component({ selector: 'app-reviews-profile', templateUrl: './reviews-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reviews-profile.component.css'] }) export class ReviewsProfileComponent implements OnInit { @Input() userIdReview: number; userReviews: IUserReview[] constructor(private userReviewsService: UserReviewService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.userReviewsService.getAll(this.userIdReview).subscribe(userReviews => this.userReviews = userReviews, ); } }
